name: Drifter Tripper
description:
Drifter Tripper - Wayward land loper is on a journey and needs your help. Guide him to the end of each level by placing directions in his path.

On this odyssey there will be many obstacles and foes such as Evil Drifter Trippers, Water, Lava, Laser Cannons, Missile launchers, Fans, Tanks, Laser Boats, Hovercraft, doors and laser gates.

Along the way you will have to
Cross seas using bridges and rafts.
Blow things up with mines and bombs.
Activate things by rolling over sensors.
Use teleporters.
Place rocks and wind breaks.
Fool missiles.
Use other strange contraptions.
Solve some simple puzzles.

Also collect coins for bonus points.

Just don't let the screen catch up with you!
